title: House for sale in Colombo 6
details:
Property is located in one of the best residential areas in Colombo 6.
Close proximity to Kirulapone, Hevelock town.

Very good neighborhood ! peaceful location ! Ideal investment !

14.5 perch land
Exclusive access road to the property
Ideal location to build a new house or the house can be turn in to a luxury house .

4 bedrooms
2 bathrooms
2500 SQFT ( Approx )

3-4 car parking space

Contact us for more details and inspections can be arranged only on prior appointments.
